value.title: StarCraft 2: INnoVation's FINAL Tournament?!
value.excerpt: In this video I cast a best-of-3 series between INnoVation and Nice in StarCraft 2, a Terran versus Protoss. INnoVation will be starting his mandatory military service soon. He mentioned that because of his age he will likely not be coming back to StarCraft 2.  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: INSANE COMEBACK! (TY vs Trap)
value.excerpt: Amazing best-of-5 series of Terran versus Protoss in StarCraft 2. This series of top-level TvP shows incredible micro and macro, cheesy build orders and defensive play, but also mistakes and because of that an insane comeback. I'm allowed to make any army units for defending, as long as I don't attack
